message: “Stop waiting for children to ask for your help. Stop waiting for children to tell you they’ve been a victim of rape, trafficking, or abuse. When you wait for a child to ask for your help, you’re placing the burden on the child,” Prestridge said.”

data.description: Captain Derek Prestridge graduated from the DPS Academy in summer 1995. He was originally stationed in Chambers County then was promoted to sergeant and moved to Orange County. Since then, he’s been working on one project that now has gained national attention. Our Senora Scott went to Austin to s...
data.title: EXCLUSIVE: Texas DPS captain speaks on training he created to rescue children from human trafficking
